about.descripcionBienvenida: We are a company dedicated to crop improvement, with solid experience in seed development and marketing. We specialize in legumes, from the collection and conservation of germplasm to its direct application in genetic improvement. We work in collaboration with a network of farms to promote the cultivation of grain legumes in Mediterranean dryland farming systems.
about.tituloproyectos: PROJECTS IN WHICH WE ARE INVOLVED
about.tituloWP: WP IN WHICH WE ARE INVOLVED
